name: dim_snif
description:
This table contains information about branches (snifs).
Each branch has a unique identifier and associated details.

columns.name: snif_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the branch.

columns.name: ir
columns.description: The city where the branch is located.

columns.name: medina
columns.description: The state where the branch is located.

hierarchies.name: snif_hierarchy
hierarchies.description:
This hierarchy represents the branch structure.
It includes the branch ID and its associated details.
